prerequisite: No pre-requisite. Required economic concepts would be taught as part of the course.
moduleDescription: This module is intended for individuals who are interested in the functions of the market in modern economies and who in the course of their careers may be in positions of regulating market behaviour for public policy purposes. The focus is to identify what makes the market imperfect or cause market failures. The course will also examine the appropriate form of governmental intervention.
faculty: LEE KUAN YEW SCHOOL OF PUBLIC POLICY
department: LEE KUAN YEW SCHOOL OF PUBLIC POLICY
